St.Ack,

We have the HCC tests in stand by, because we have to show some pe=
ople
that Heritrix can run multiple parallel jobs in the same machine. 

As=
 a colleague had tested making a Heritrix wrapper (embedding it in
an appli=
cation), to run multiple Heritrix instances in the same JVM,
we decided to =
build something like that, to demostrate that actually,
multiple jobs could=
 run in parallel. We think that we will be testing
HCC again after that.

W=
e have some problems with the wrapper, exactly with the method
getHostAddre=
ss (only when running two or more parallel jobs). At first
we though that w=
as a Heritrix 1.6 problem (because of the static
controller), but the same =
happens with 1.8. 

So, we are going to make some more tests, and try to fi=
nd the root of
the problem (maybe is the wrapper).

By the way, do you know=
 if someone have succesfully tested multiple
Heritrix instances in the same=
 JVM, running two or more parallel jobs?

Thanks very much,

tizo
